Santa_Rosa.South Park, Santa Rosa, California: South Park is residential neighborhood in the city of Santa Rosa, California. It is located in south Santa Rosa, below the U.S Highway 101 and west of the Sonoma County Fairgrounds, and encompasses 60 blocks. The community is notorious for its high crime rate and gang activity. South Park was also once a settlement for African Americans during the mid-1900s and was a center of Santa Rosa's black community. It currently has a mostly Hispanic population.
